text: Husky Memorial, also called Husky Monument, is a memorial for dead motorcyclists in California's Mojave Desert. It is on Bureau of Land Management (BLM) land, allowed by BLM but not officially sanctioned. It is a two-hour, ride from U.S. 395, the nearest paved road. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Monuments and memorials in California
title: Husky Memorial
